before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8baf3","text":"The protocol for generating protoplasts on a small scale is for Fusarium oxysporum and is in development. We are open to other fungal species attempting the task and providing a report on their success or any modifications to the methods.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":64,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Tao-Ho Chang

affiliations.affiliation: Program in Plant Health Care, Academy of Circular Economy, National Chung Hsing University

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ulpc","text":"The generation of fungal protoplasts is crucial for advancing fungal gene editing methods. We aim to implement the ribonucleoprotein (RNP) method for gene editing (Wang et al., 2018). Generating protoplasts is a demanding task that requires substantial resources to obtain an adequate amount for a single transformation reaction. The cost of cell wall degrading enzymes is the most significant expense in the protoplast generation process. In this study, we have developed a process for small-scale protoplast generation that not only reduces resource usage but also significantly cuts down the amount of cell wall degrading enzyme required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"87hed","text":"Biomaterials: different species of Fusarium oxysporum ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":35,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"591b0","text":"Growth medium: half-strength potato dextrose broth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90qc9","text":"Digestion buffer: 10 mg/mL Driselase and 15 mg/mL ß-glocanase dissolved in 0.8 M NaCl solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqpj2","text":"SuTC stabiliser buffer: 20% sucrose, 10 mM CaCl2 ,10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":47,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"b9hao","text":"Wang, Q., Cobine, P. A. \u0026 Coleman, J. J. Efficient genome editing in Fusarium oxysporum based on CRISPR/Cas9 ribonucleoprotein complexes. Fungal Genetics and Biology 117, 21–29 (2018).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":138,"length":27},{"style":"bold","offset":166,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9djo","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2pqr4","text":"Rinse Fusarium oxysporum fungal spores from the two-week-old culture plate with 7 mL distilled water, and filter the spore suspension with sterilized filter paper or 4 layers of Miracloth. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b42h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uspo","text":"The   of germinated spores were added into the filter column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24ec5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vts9","text":"Add the digestion buffer (10 mg/mL Driselase and 15 mg/mL ß-glocanase dissolved in 0.8 M NaCl solution )   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5jdu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4465s","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8e6sd","text":"Centrifuge the mixture, pelleting the protoplast to the centrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8t7rt","text":"The protoplasts are able to apply in CRISPR/Cas gene editing system or subject to cell staining for microscopy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edfub","text":"Count the number of spores in spore suspension with hemocytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"301i3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6dne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28qv9","text":"The 106 / mL spore suspenstion  were added into the culture medium 50 mL half-strength PDB, and grow the culture in 28 ºC for 20-24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":6,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbp9a","text":"Remaining the pellet of protoplast, remove the digestion buffer carefully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq67a","text":"Add   of SuTC stabilizer buffer (20% sucrose, 10 mM CaCl2 ,10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5) for washing pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":56,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4tnt2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ggrf","text":"Wash the mycelium with 700 µL of distilled water, and continue pipetting until the mycelium is suspended in the distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"53rp6","text":"Centrifuge again to remove water and change new collection tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bl3d7","text":"Change collection tube to 2 mL tube for collecting protoplast.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dv9lg","text":"Assemble sterilized collection tube and tissue filter column (Lot.: CDC25049A, FAVORGEN®Biotech Corp., Pingtung, Taiwan).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"kq7c","text":"centrifuge at 1000 xg for 5 min, and repeat wash process twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68juk","text":"dissolve pellet carefully in 500 µL SuTC buffer, and count protoplast concentration with hemocytometer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1ui1","text":"Generally, the concentration of protoplast per column will be fall around 105 to 106 / mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":76,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":83,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: A small scale of Fusarium oxysporum protoplast generation
